name: Kairon - AI Powered Contextual Chatbot Builder
description: Kairon is an open-source platform that uses the capabilities of RASA to help build contextual AI chatbots by providing no-code platform.

shortcuts.name: Build chatbots today!
shortcuts.description: Register yourself on Kairon and start building bots within minutes.

shortcuts.name: Login
shortcuts.description: If you're already a member, login and continue building awesome stuff.
